targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  id AS "Category ID",
  title AS "Category Title"
FROM category
WHERE id IN ($category)
ORDER BY Title

SELECT 
  SUM("viewCount") AS "Views",
  SUM(likes) AS "Likes",
  SUM(dislikes) AS "Dislikes",
  SUM("commentCount") AS "Comments"
FROM video_summary

SELECT 
  max_freq,
  category.title
FROM 
  into_values((SELECT mcv_agg(1, "categoryId") FROM video)) AS values
JOIN category ON category.id = values.value
ORDER BY max_freq DESC
LIMIT 6

SELECT 
  category.title AS "Category",
  COUNT(*) AS "Videos Published"
FROM video, category
WHERE "categoryId"=category.id
GROUP BY "Category"
ORDER BY "Videos Published"  DESC
LIMIT 10

SELECT
  category.title,
  SUM("viewCount") AS "Views"
FROM video, category
WHERE "categoryId"=category.id
GROUP BY category.id
ORDER BY "Views" DESC
LIMIT 3

WITH most AS 
  (
    SELECT
      video.title AS "Video Title", 
      video."channelId",
      video."categoryId" AS "Category",
      MAX("viewCount") AS "Views"
    FROM
      video
    GROUP BY video.id
    ORDER BY MAX("viewCount") DESC
    LIMIT 3
  )
SELECT 
  most."Video Title", 
  channel.title AS "Channel", 
  most."channelId" AS "Channel ID",
  category.title AS "Category",
  category.id AS "Category ID",
  most."Views"
FROM 
  channel, most, category
WHERE 
  channel.id = most."channelId" 
  AND category.id = most."Category"
ORDER BY most."Views" DESC

SELECT
  category.title,
  SUM("likes") AS "Likes"
FROM video, category
WHERE "categoryId"=category.id
GROUP BY category.id
ORDER BY "Likes" DESC
LIMIT 3

WITH most AS 
  (
    SELECT
      video.title AS "Video Title", 
      MAX(likes) AS "Likes",
      video."channelId",
      video."categoryId" AS "Category"
    FROM
      video
    GROUP BY video.id
    ORDER BY MAX(likes) DESC
    LIMIT 3
  )
SELECT 
  most."Video Title", 
  channel.title AS "Channel", 
  most."channelId" AS "Channel ID",
  category.title AS "Category",
  category.id AS "Category ID",
  most."Likes"
FROM 
  channel, most, category
WHERE 
  channel.id = most."channelId" 
  AND category.id = most."Category"
ORDER BY most."Likes" DESC

SELECT
  category.title,
  SUM("dislikes") AS "Dislikes"
FROM video, category
WHERE "categoryId"=category.id
GROUP BY category.id
ORDER BY "Dislikes" DESC
LIMIT 3

WITH most AS 
  (
    SELECT
      video.title AS "Video Title", 
      MAX(dislikes) AS "Dislikes",
      video."channelId",
      video."categoryId" AS "Category"
    FROM
      video
    GROUP BY video.id
    ORDER BY MAX(dislikes) DESC
    LIMIT 3
  )
SELECT 
  most."Video Title", 
  channel.title AS "Channel", 
  most."channelId" AS "Channel ID",
  category.title AS "Category",
  category.id AS "Category ID",
  most."Dislikes"
FROM 
  channel, most, category
WHERE 
  channel.id = most."channelId" 
  AND category.id = most."Category"
ORDER BY most."Dislikes" DESC

SELECT
  category.title,
  SUM("commentCount") AS "Comments"
FROM video, category
WHERE "categoryId"=category.id
GROUP BY category.id
ORDER BY "Comments" DESC
LIMIT 3

WITH most AS 
  (
    SELECT
      video.title AS "Video Title", 
      video."channelId",
      video."categoryId" AS "Category",
      MAX("commentCount") AS "Comments"
    FROM
      video
    GROUP BY video.id
    ORDER BY MAX("commentCount") DESC
    LIMIT 3
  )
SELECT 
  most."Video Title", 
  channel.title AS "Channel", 
  most."channelId" AS "Channel ID",
  category.title AS "Category",
  category.id AS "Category ID",
  most."Comments"
FROM 
  channel, most, category
WHERE 
  channel.id = most."channelId" 
  AND category.id = most."Category"
ORDER BY most."Comments" DESC

SELECT 
  SUM("videosPublished") AS "Videos Published"
FROM video_summary
WHERE year = $year 
GROUP BY "year"

SELECT
  SUM("trendsCount") AS "Trends"
FROM trend_summary
WHERE year = $year 
GROUP BY "year"

WITH most AS 
  (
    SELECT
      "categoryId",
      COUNT(*) AS "Trends"
    FROM trend
    WHERE 
      EXTRACT(YEAR FROM "trendingDate" AT TIME ZONE 'UTC') = $year
    GROUP BY "categoryId"
    ORDER BY "Trends" DESC
    LIMIT 10
  )
SELECT 
  category.title AS "Category",
  most."Trends"
FROM 
  category, most
WHERE 
  category.id = most."categoryId"
ORDER BY "Trends" DESC

list.definition:
SELECT 
  id AS __value,
  title AS __text
FROM category
list.label: Category
list.name: category
